original_text: The Lord of hosts hath sworn by himself, saying, Surely I will fill thee with men, as with caterpillers; and they shall lift up a shout against thee.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 자기의 목숨을 두고 맹세하시되 내가 진실로 사람을 메뚜기 같이 네게 가득하게 하리니 그들이 너를 향하여 환성을 높이리라 하시도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord of hosts hath sworn by himself,
Surely I will fill thee with men,
and they shall lift up a shout against thee.
